title: Chronic Governance Working Group - Q3 2022
description:
Chronic Governance Working Group - Q3 2022 funding

Community-spend proposal submitted by returniflost (https://twitter.com/loaf0bred) of Glassflow

-=-=-

Full proposal: https://github.com/ChronicNetwork/Governance/blob/main/proposals/govfund-1 Amount to spend from the community pool: 380,000 CHT & 100,000 CGAS

Timeline: Q3 2022

Deliverables:
1. A governance working group community & charter
2. A template for community spend proposals
3. A best-practices document for community spend proposals
4. An educational wiki for the Cosmos Hub parameters
5. A best-practices document for parameter changes
6. Monthly governance working group community calls (three)
7. Monthly GWG articles (three)
8. One Q4 2022 GWG recommendations article

Milestones:
By end of Month 1, the Cosmos Governance Working Group (GWG) should have been initiated and led by community members.
By end of Month 2, These governance members is to have initiated and led GWGâ€™s education, best practices, and Q2 recommendations.
By end of Month 3, thesse governance members is to have led and published initial governance education, best practices, and Q4 recommendations.

Detailed milestones and funding:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kAcjSSBNwyxE47W_wiyds4tzgcwxhfznWNO1JM4eNcA/edit?usp=sharing

. The GWG will engage with stake-holders to lower the barriers to governance participation with the aim of empowering the Chronic Chains stakeholders. The GWG will use this engagement to guide recommendations for future GWG planning.
